```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rethinking)
library(cmdstanr)
library(posterior)
library(bayesplot)
library(broom)
color_scheme_set("brightblue")

```

```{r}
set.seed(42)
d_sim = tibble(
  wt_reads = rpois(1e4, 1.5),
  mut_reads = rpois(1e4, 0.1)) %>% 
  mutate(positive_wt = wt_reads > 0, positive_mut = mut_reads > 0)
summary(d_sim)

d = list(
  N = 10000,
  n_wt = d_sim$positive_wt %>% sum,
  n_mut = d_sim$positive_mut %>% sum
)
mod = cmdstan_model('m1.stan')
mod$print()

fit <- mod$sample(
  data = d, 
  seed = 123, 
  chains = 4, 
  parallel_chains = 4,
  refresh = 500
)
```
```{r}
stanfit <- rstan::read_stan_csv(fit$output_files())
precis(stanfit)
precis(stanfit)[3,3:4] %>% exp
0.1/1.5
```
